pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Monday, November 23, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.            

The Prime Minister will chair the Cabinet meeting.

1:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will virtually visit a grade 5 and 6 class at St. Martha Catholic School in Kingston, Ontario, with Member of Parliament for Kingston and the Islands Mark Gerretsen.

Closed to media.
